name: Agriculture hat
description: As a consequence of the prolonged health and social crisis of the COVID-19 pandemic, the extreme poverty rate in Latin America would have increased from 13.1% of the population in 2020 to 13.8% in 2021, a setback of 27 years. ECLAC indicates that in 2020 the proportion of women who do not receive their own income increased and poverty gaps remained in rural areas. Rural poverty must stop.
